displaymaker: Anthony van Dyck, 1599–1641; born Antwerp, Belgium; died London, England
caption: Anthony van Dyck (1599–1641; born Antwerp, Belgium; died London, England), Adam van Noort (M.-H 8, third state of seven), ca. 1640 – 1650. Etching and engraving; watermarks: escutcheobn with fleur-de-lis, crown; IHS with cross above; 24.2 x 15.7 cm (plate), 32.4 x 22.7 cm (sheet). Gift of Mrs. John L. Bates in memory of her father, Russell T. Mount, Class of 1902 (x1976-129)
